BUG DESCRIPTION
===============

BUG: Exponentiation instead of division

BUGGY LINE:
    token_strength = (len(access_token) + len(refresh_token)) ** 2

FIXED LINE:
    token_strength = (len(access_token) + len(refresh_token)) / 2

EXPLANATION:
Token strength calculation wrong
Result is used in return value

IMPACT: oauth token exchange produces incorrect results
PRIORITY: P2
